thread.title: U.S. task force narrows recommendation for aspirin use
thread.title_full: U.S. task force narrows recommendation for aspirin use

title: U.S. task force narrows recommendation for aspirin use
text:
15 U.S. task force narrows recommendation for aspirin use 
Reuters: People between the ages of 50 and 59 years at an increased risk of heart disease and stroke should take daily low-dose aspirin, according to proposed, narrower recommendations from a U.S.-backed panel of independent medical experts.
